TopicTitle: MechJeb install on Mac? Please Help.

Articles.Content:
Im having trouble getting MechJeb installed on my Mac. The MechJeb version as listed on Space Port is [.23] MechJeb 2.1.1

I have the latest version of KSP as well. I am able to add the MechJeb parts in the VAB but no window appears for the plugin.

I feel like I have tried everything. Also if this is the wrong thread I apologize, this is my first post on the forum and I have not found any

reference to MechJeb on Mac anywhere.
You just need to unzip the fil in your KSP/GameData folder.
The file unzips in the browser. And there is no files inside /gamedata for plugins, only parts. The plugin folder is inside the .ksp folder.

> The file unzips in the browser.

I'm not sure why that's happening. What browser are you using?

Put the entire folder named, "MechJeb2" into the GameData folder. DO NOT separate out the parts and plugins -- those folders are old and Squad only keeps them around for legacy support. (It would be much less confusing if they just got rid of them.)
